survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Contactless Parking Payment Solutions Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction with contactless parking payment solutions, including ease of use, reliability, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use contactless parking payment solutions?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to ensure clarity. Consider adding a 'Not Applicable' option if needed.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use contactless parking payment solutions?

questions.question_text: Which of the following contactless payment methods have you used for parking? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.

script.question_text: Which of the following contactless payment methods have you used for parking? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ease of use of contactless parking payment solutions?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ease of use of contactless parking payment solutions?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for contactless parking payment solutions?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for contactless parking payment solutions?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend contactless parking payment solutions to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format for straightforward feedback. Consider adding a follow-up question for 'Maybe' responses.

script.question_text: Would you recommend contactless parking payment solutions to others?
